name: hitchhiked
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
past simple and past participle of
hitchhike
B1 to travel by getting free rides in someone else's vehicle: I would never hitchhike on my own. They hitchhiked to Paris. See also
hitch verb (RIDE)
